schemeName: Ayushman Bharat Pradhan Mantri Jan Arogya Yojana (AB-PMJAY)
description: The world's largest health insurance scheme, providing a health cover of ₹5 lakh per family per year for secondary and tertiary care hospitalization.
ministry: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare

eligibility.notes: Eligibility is complex and based on SECC 2011 census data, often covering families with an annual income below ₹2.5 lakh.

benefits: Cashless health insurance coverage up to ₹5 lakh per family per year.

description: A mission to provide affordable housing to the urban poor, including slum dwellers.
ministry: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs

eligibility.notes: Income limits vary by category (EWS up to ₹3 lakh, LIG up to ₹6 lakh, etc.). Beneficiary family should not own a 'pucca' house.

benefits: Provides a Credit Linked Subsidy Scheme (CLSS) on home loans.

description: A scheme to provide a pucca house with basic amenities to all houseless households in rural areas.

eligibility.notes: Beneficiaries are identified based on housing deprivation parameters in the SECC 2011 data.

benefits: Provides financial assistance for the construction of a pucca house.

description: Provides income support to all landholding farmer families in the country.

eligibility.notes: All landholding farmer families are eligible, subject to certain exclusion criteria.

benefits: Financial benefit of ₹6,000 per year in three equal installments.

description: A scheme to provide clean cooking fuel (LPG) to women from poor households.

eligibility.notes: Applicant must be from a Below Poverty Line (BPL) family without an existing LPG connection.

benefits: Provides a deposit-free LPG connection.

schemeName: Mahatma Gandhi National Rural Employment Guarantee Act (MGNREGA)
description: Guarantees 100 days of wage employment to any rural household whose adult members volunteer to do unskilled manual work.

eligibility.notes: Any adult member of a rural household is eligible.

benefits: Guaranteed 100 days of wage employment.

description: National Mission for Financial Inclusion to ensure access to financial services.

eligibility.notes: Any individual who does not have a bank account is eligible. Can be opened for minors aged 10 and above with a guardian.

benefits: A basic savings bank account with no minimum balance, a RuPay debit card, and accident insurance.

description: A pension scheme for citizens of India, focused on the unorganised sector.

eligibility.notes: Must have a bank account and should not be a member of any other statutory social security scheme.

benefits: Guaranteed minimum monthly pension of ₹1,000 to ₹5,000 after age 60.

description: A small deposit scheme for the girl child, launched as a part of the 'Beti Bachao Beti Padhao' campaign.

eligibility.notes: An account can be opened in the name of a girl child until she attains the age of 10.

benefits: High interest rate and tax benefits, providing a fund for the girl child's higher education or marriage.
applicationLink: Available through post offices and authorized banks.

description: Provides loans up to ₹10 lakh to non-corporate, non-farm small/micro enterprises.

eligibility.notes: For non-farm sector income generating activities.

benefits: Provides loans categorized as Shishu (up to ₹50,000), Kishor (₹50,001-₹5 lakh), and Tarun (₹5 lakh-₹10 lakh).

description: Facilitates bank loans between ₹10 lakh and ₹1 crore to at least one SC/ST borrower and at least one woman borrower per bank branch.

eligibility.notes: For setting up a greenfield (first-time) enterprise. This scheme targets women OR SC/ST entrepreneurs.

benefits: Facilitates bank loans from ₹10 lakh to ₹1 crore to promote entrepreneurship.

description: An insurance service for farmers for their yields against crop failure.

eligibility.notes: All farmers including sharecroppers and tenant farmers are eligible.

benefits: Provides insurance coverage and financial support in the event of crop failure.

description: Provides financial assistance to the elderly, widows, and persons with disabilities in the form of social pensions.

eligibility.notes: Comprises several sub-schemes for old age, widows, and disability. Criteria vary slightly for each.

benefits: Provides a monthly pension to eligible beneficiaries.

description: A maternity benefit program that provides a cash incentive to pregnant women and lactating mothers for the first live birth.
ministry: Ministry of Women and Child Development

eligibility.notes: Available for the first live birth. Excludes women in regular government employment.

benefits: Cash incentive of ₹5,000 in installments.

description: A credit-linked subsidy programme for generating self-employment opportunities through micro-enterprises.
ministry: Ministry of Micro, Small and Medium Enterprises

eligibility.notes: For setting up new projects. Minimum 8th standard pass for projects above a certain cost.

benefits: Provides a government subsidy on the project cost.

schemeName: Deen Dayal Upadhyaya Grameen Kaushalya Yojana (DDU-GKY)
description: A skill training and placement program for rural youth.
benefits: Provides free skill training with a focus on placements.

description: Aims for universal access to equitable, affordable & quality health care services.
ministry: Ministry of Health and Family Welfare

eligibility.notes: Universal scheme. It is a framework for health programs rather than a direct benefit scheme.

benefits: Strengthens health infrastructure, provides free essential drugs, and supports reproductive, maternal, and child health services.

description: A special micro-credit facility for street vendors.
ministry: Ministry of Housing and Urban Affairs
benefits: Provides a collateral-free working capital loan of up to ₹10,000, with subsequent loans of higher value.

description: An overarching programme for the school education sector from pre-school to class 12.

eligibility.notes: Covers all children from pre-primary to senior secondary levels in government and aided schools.

benefits: Provides support for school infrastructure, teacher training, free textbooks, and uniforms.

description: Provides for food and nutritional security by ensuring access to adequate quantity of quality food at affordable prices.
ministry: Ministry of Consumer Affairs, Food & Public Distribution

eligibility.notes: Covers up to 75% of the rural population and 50% of the urban population for receiving subsidized foodgrains.

benefits: Eligible households receive highly subsidized foodgrains (rice, wheat, coarse grains).

description: A National Programme for Civil Services Capacity Building.
benefits: Provides a platform (iGOT Karmayogi) for continuous online training for all government officials.

description: Provides day-care facilities to the children of working mothers.
ministry: Ministry of Women and Child Development

eligibility.notes: Primarily for children of working mothers. A nominal user fee is charged.

benefits: Provides day-care, supplementary nutrition, and pre-school education.

description: The flagship scheme to enable Indian youth to take up industry-relevant skill training.
ministry: Ministry of Skill Development and Entrepreneurship

eligibility.notes: Targeted towards unemployed youth, school/college drop-outs.

benefits: Provides free short-duration skill training and certification, along with placement assistance.

description: Provides financial assistance to startups for proof of concept, prototype development, product trials, and market entry.
ministry: Department for Promotion of Industry and Internal Trade

eligibility.notes: A startup recognized by DPIIT, incorporated not more than 2 years ago at the time of application.

benefits: Provides up to ₹20 Lakhs as a grant and up to ₹50 Lakhs of investment for market entry and scaling up.

schemeName: Scheme for Promotion of Academic and Research Collaboration (SPARC)
description: Aims at improving the research ecosystem of India’s higher educational institutions.

eligibility.notes: Proposals are submitted by Indian institutions for collaboration with foreign universities.

benefits: Funds joint research projects, workshops, and courses.
